name: Simpe Tanks
description: In this small, simple single-player game you must drive a green mini-tank and shoot down the red mini-tanks that driven by your device. On the first level you have to shoot down one mini-tank, in the second - two, etc. I.e. level number corresponds to the number of mini-tanks on it. Use the brick blocks as a hide-out. Try to survive so many levels as possible.
